sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Populate Supplier Product UOM field with defalut value, this is (Note: change is for August release can remove this after that)</description> <name>Populate Supplier Product UOM (Aug)</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[//update all published and active supplier products with default unit value var supplierProductGR = new SupplierProduct().get('active=true^published=true^uomISEMPTY'); supplierProductGR.setValue('uom', POPConstants.UNIT_INDIVIDUAL); supplierProductGR.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-06-21 19:57:50</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b321598353303010339addeeff7b12bf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate Supplier Product UOM (Aug)</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b321598353303010339addeeff7b12bf</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-07-16 11:29:55</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
